meanings: wait, hold on, (informal) hang on, (예정된 일·사람 등을) expect, (formal) await, (고대하다) look forward to

examples.korean: With so many ifs and buts, it is easier to wait and see. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 조건과 이의들이 너무 많아서 기다려 보는 것이 더 수월하겠다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: With so many ifs and buts, it is easier to wait and see. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Please wait your turn. 듣기 Add to Wordbook (당신) 차례를 기다려 주세요. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: Wait for the game to load. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 게임이 로딩될 때까지 기다려. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: the band’s eagerly awaited new CD 듣기 Add to Wordbook 간절히 기다려 온 그 밴드의 새 시디 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
